misrepresentation_or_fraud: inconsistency in educational history leading to alleged misrepresentation
evidence_assessment: claimed enrollment in full-time studies since 2009 but provided evidence of part-time studies starting in 2010
legal_basis: Judicial review of the Officer's decision under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act

procedural_fairness: Officer's obligation to notify applicants of inconsistencies
decision_reasoning: No requirement for Officer to address inconsistency with Applicant before rejecting claim
evidence_presented: Applicant's enrollment history showing part-time status from March 2010
